response.overview: In a city trembling between memory and revolt, Luka, a young drama student, drifts through the unrest of his generation. When a protest erupts, his world collides with love, fear, and the legacy of his father’s authority. As the lines between the personal and the political blur, Luka’s silent struggle becomes a shared pulse — a movement where private pain turns into collective defiance.
response.title: Indeks
